about_the_game:
Suddenly pulled into a realm of twisted monsters, Tristan is pursued by shadows that feed on anxiety and despair. 

As the weight of fear, failure, and life’s burdens threatens to crush him, the only way out is to go deeper into the nightmare. Uncover the source of the darkness, fight your fears, and put an end to the torment that chases you.

Game Features

  • Rich Exploration: Explore intricately designed levels, uncovering hidden secrets, powerful items, and meeting mysterious NPCs along the way.

  • Fast-Paced Combat: Battle nightmarish foes using a variety of weapons and abilities. Dodge devastating attacks and strike when you see openings.

  • Grow Your Power: Increase Tristan's power using shards dropped by monsters, making your abilities grow stronger with each victory. Customize your playstyle with a comprehensive skill tree.

  • Unlock New Secrets: Open up new paths in previous areas using abilities and items found in later levels. Each discovery leads you closer to unraveling the nightmare's true origin.

  • Memorable Enemies: You are not alone in this nightmare. As you explore, face off against nearly two dozen unique enemies and bosses who each have their own set of deadly combat abilities.

  • Flexible Difficulty: Focus on experiencing the story, or challenge yourself with brutal action.

New to Ultimate Edition

  • Ultimate Nightmare Mode: This new game mode offers players a more intense survival horror experience through remixed and expanded levels; new enemies, abilities, and souls; and a post-game story that delves into the truth behind the realm of monsters.

  • Major Visual Enhancements: Levels have been remastered with improved environmental details, reworked enemy animations, and a new lighting system that amplifies the horror.

  • Quality of Life Improvements: Noxia Somnia: Ultimate Edition features smoother combat, enhanced enemy AI, and refined UI/UX for a more engaging gameplay experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Noxia Somnia includes references and dialogue about depressing topics such as alcohol usage, self-harm, and suicide. Visual depictions of suicide such as hanging bodies can be seen in the game as well. Noxia Somnia also includes a large amount of blood, gore, and violence throughout.

short_description: Noxia Somnia: Ultimate Edition is a remaster and story expansion of the indie horror gem Noxia Somnia. This definitive edition enhances the game’s signature mix of exploration and action combat while staying true to its retro horror aesthetic.
